data.text: Eka ayub nodwoko kama:
“Ee, angʼeyo ni gima iwachono en adier.
Kata dabed ni ngʼato dwaro mino kode wach,
Riekone tut kendo tekre ngʼeny.
Ogolo gode kuonde ma gintie ka ok gingʼeyo
Oyiengo piny gie mise mare
Kowuoyo to chiengʼ ok rieny
En owuon ema noyaro polo
En ema nochweyo sulwe madongo kaka, yugni, oluoro-budho, ratego,
Otimo gik madongo miwuoro mayombo pach dhano,
Ka okadho buta to ok anyal nene;
Kokawo gimoro odhigo; to en ngʼa manyalo tame?
Nyasaye ok gengʼ mirimbe kendo nyaka jolwenj Rahab
“Ere kuma dayudie weche ma dawachne?
Kata dabed ni aonge richo kata achiel, to ok dadwoke;
Kata dabed ni aluonge mi obiro ira,
Mirimb Nyasaye nyalo tieka
Ok onyal weya aywe
Kaponi teko ema iwuoyoe, to otek ndi,
Kata dabed ni aonge richo kata achiel,
“Kata dabed ni aonge gi ketho moro amora,
Ma emomiyo aneno ni gik moko duto chalre
Ka masira oneko apoya,
Nyasaye oseketo piny e lwet joma timbegi richo,
“Ndalona ringo mapiyo moloyo jangʼwech;
Gikadho piyo mana ka yiedhi molos gi oundho maringo e nam,
Ka anyalo wacho ni wiya owil gi gik maricho ma Nyasaye osetimona,
Kata kamano, pod aluoro aluora masira momaka
Kaka koro osekawa ni an jaketho,
Kata dine aluokra gi sabun
to pod ibiro luta mana e chwodho mi nyaka lepa
“Nyasaye ok en dhano kaka an ma dahedhra dwokora kode,
Ka dine bed ni nitie ngʼato manyalo bedo jathek e kinda gi Nyasaye,
kata ngʼat manyalo golo kum mare kuoma,
eka dine awuoyo ka ok aluore,
